verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and fell down <S%H5307><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilboa <S%H1533><s%>.

And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> followed hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and after <S%H310><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>; and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>, and Abinadab <S%H41><s%>, and Malchi-shua <S%H4444><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>.

And the battle <S%H4421><s%> went sore <S%H3513><s%> against Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and the archers <S%H3384><s%> <S%H7198><s%> hit <S%H4672><s%> him, and he was wounded <S%H2342><s%> of the archers <S%H3384><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to his armourbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%>, Draw <S%H8025><s%> thy sword <S%H2719><s%>, and thrust <S%H1856><s%> me through therewith; lest these uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> come <S%H935><s%> and abuse <S%H5953><s%> me. But his armourbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not; for he was sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%>. So Saul <S%H7586><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%>, and fell <S%H5307><s%> upon it.

And when his armourbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%>, he fell <S%H5307><s%> likewise on the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%>.
So Saul <S%H7586><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and his three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, and all his house <S%H1004><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

And when all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were in the valley <S%H6010><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that they fled <S%H5127><s%>, and that Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were dead <S%H4191><s%>, then they forsook <S%H5800><s%> their cities <S%H5892><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%>: and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in them.

¶ And it came to pass on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to strip <S%H6584><s%> the slain <S%H2491><s%>, that they found <S%H4672><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilboa <S%H1533><s%>.

And when they had stripped <S%H6584><s%> him, they took <S%H5375><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%>, and his armour <S%H3627><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, to carry tidings <S%H1319><s%> unto their idols <S%H6091><s%>, and to the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And they put <S%H7760><s%> his armour <S%H3627><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%>, and fastened <S%H8628><s%> his head <S%H1538><s%> in the temple <S%H1004><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%>.
¶ And when all Jabesh-gilead <S%H3003><s%> <S%H1568><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> all that the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%>,

They arose <S%H6965><s%>, all the valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H376><s%>, and took away <S%H5375><s%> the body <S%H1480><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and the bodies <S%H1480><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Jabesh <S%H3003><s%>, and buried <S%H6912><s%> their bones <S%H6106><s%> under the oak <S%H424><s%> in Jabesh <S%H3003><s%>, and fasted <S%H6684><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

¶ So Saul <S%H7586><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> for his transgression <S%H4604><s%> which he committed <S%H4603><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, even against the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which he kept <S%H8104><s%> not, and also for asking <S%H7592><s%> counsel of one that had a familiar spirit <S%H178><s%>, to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of it;

And inquired <S%H1875><s%> not of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: therefore he slew <S%H4191><s%> him, and turned <S%H5437><s%> the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%>.
